plugin.name: shader-dock
plugin._long: A dock panel with shader-based icon effects including bevel, shimmer, and 3D button styling.

option.name: apps
option._long: Space-separated list of application IDs (desktop file names without .desktop extension) to show in the dock

option.name: icon_size
option._long: Size of dock icons in pixels

option.name: margin
option._long: Margin around the dock in pixels

option.name: corner_radius
option._long: Radius of rounded corners for icons

option.name: bevel_color
option._long: Color of the bevel/shimmer effect on icons

option.name: background_color
option._long: Background color of the dock panel
